snippet: A respected columnist was dismissed from the magazine after he wrote that the right to bear arms needs to be subjected to legitimate regulation.
abstract: Editorial cites dismissal of journalist Dick Metcalf from staff of Guns & Ammo magazine after he wrote article in favor of regulating gun ownership; submits action offers rare peek into gun journalism as mouthpiece of gun industry; faults both journalism and industry for avoiding serious debate about gun rights.
lead_paragraph: A respected columnist was dismissed from the magazine after he wrote that the right to bear arms needs to be subjected to legitimate regulation.
